mapper.insert: INSERT INTO visit (member_id, hospital_name, department, visit_date, cost, diagnosis) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{hospital_name}, #{department}, #{visit_date}, #{cost}, #{diagnosis});
mapper.update: UPDATE visit SET hospital_name = #{hospital_name}, department = #{department}, visit_date = #{visit_date}, cost = #{cost}, diagnosis = #{diagnosis} WHERE visit_id = #{visit_id};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM visit WHERE DATE(visit_date) = #{date} ORDER BY visit_date ASC
